document.full_text: too little is known about libya's rebels and they remain too fragmented for the united states to get seriously involved in organizing or training them, let alone arming them, u.s. and european officials say.
document.title: u.s., allies see libyan rebels in hopeless disarray
lines_and_colors: too little is known about libya's rebels and they remain too fragmented for the united states to get seriously involved in organizing or training them, let alone arming them, u.s. and european officials say.
